exceptions.exn: In environment A : Type A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) a : Term A n l1 : list (Term A n) H2 : olist (A:=A) ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a (pO A n)) /\\ nZterm A0 eqA (n:=n) (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a (pO A n)) H3 : olist (A:=A) ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a l1) /\\ nZterm A0 eqA (n:=n) (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a l1) H4 : olist (A:=A) ltM (mults multA (n:=n) (invTerm invA (n:=n) (T1 A1 n)) l1) /\\ nZterm A0 eqA (n:=n) (mults multA (n:=n) (invTerm invA (n:=n) (T1 A1 n)) l1) Unable to unify "olist (A:=A) ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a l1) /\\ nZterm A0 eqA (n:=n) (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a l1)" with "olist (A:=A) ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a (mults multA (n:=n) (invTerm invA (n:=n) (T1 A1 n)) l1)) /\\ nZterm A0 eqA (n:=n) (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a (mults multA (n:=n) (invTerm invA (n:=n) (T1 A1 n)) l1))".

ctx: intros l1 l2 l3 a H1 H2 H3 H4.
unfold canonical in H2, H3, H4.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
A: Type
A1: A
A0: A
eqA: A -> A -> Prop
plusA: A -> A -> A
invA: A -> A
multA: A -> A -> A
minusA: A -> A -> A
divA: A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A
cs: CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA
eqA_dec: forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}
n: nat
ltM: mon n -> mon n -> Prop
ltM_dec: forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}
os: OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n)

Goal:
forall (l1 l2 l3 : list (Term A n)) (a : Term A n), minusP l1 l2 l3 -> canonical A0 eqA ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a l1) -> canonical A0 eqA ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a l2) -> canonical A0 eqA ltM l3 -> canonical A0 eqA ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a l3)

Premises:

minusP_ind : forall P : list (Term A n) -> list (Term A n) -> list (Term A n) -> Prop, (forall l1 : list (Term A n), P (pO A n) l1 (mults multA (n:=n) (invTerm invA (n:=n) (T1 A1 n)) l1)) -> (forall l1 : list (Term A n), P l1 (pO A n) l1) ->...-> P l l0 l1
pluspf_com : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA ->...-> forall p q : list (Term A n), eqP A eqA n (pluspf A0 (eqA:=eqA) plusA eqA_dec (ltM:=ltM) ltM_dec p q) (pluspf A0 (eqA:=eqA) plusA eqA_dec (ltM:=ltM) ltM_dec q p)
mainu2a : forall (A : Type) (A0 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop) (a1 a2 : Term A n) (l1 l2 l3 : list (Term A n)), plusP A A0 eqA plusA n ltM l1 l2 l3 -> eqT (A:=A) (n:=n) a1 a2 -> zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) (plusTerm plusA (n:=n) a1 a2) -> plusP A A0 eqA plusA n ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a1 l1) (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a2 l2) l3
pluspf : forall A : Type, A -> forall eqA : A -> A -> Prop, (A -> A -> A) -> (forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) -> forall (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop), (forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}) -> list (Term A n) -> list (Term A n) -> list (Term A n)
Inductive plusP (A : Type) (A0 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop) : list (Term A n) -> list (Term A n) -> list (Term A n) -> Prop := nillu1 : forall l1 : list (Term A n), plusP A A0 eqA plusA n ltM (pO A n) l1 l1 | nillu2 : forall l1 : list (Term A n), plusP A A0 eqA plusA n ltM l1 (pO A n) l1 | mainu1 : forall (a1 a2 : Term A n) (l1 l2 l3 : list (Term A n)), ltT (A:=A) ltM a2 a1 -> plusP A A0 eqA plusA n ltM l1 (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a2 l2...
plusP_inv3a : forall (A : Type) (A0 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop) (ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}), OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) -> forall (a b : Term A n) (p q s : list (Term A n)), eqT (A:=A) (n:=n) a b -> zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) (plusTerm plusA (n:=n) a b) ->...-> s = pluspf A0 (eqA:=eqA) plusA eqA_dec (ltM:=ltM) ltM_dec p q
ltP_pX_canonical : forall (A : Type) (A0 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop), (forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) -> forall (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop) (a : Term A n) (p : list (Term A n)), canonical A0 eqA ltM p -> ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a -> ltP (A:=A) ltM p (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a (pO A n)) -> canonical A0 eqA ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p)
eqp_imp_canonical : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> (forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) -> forall (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop) (p q : list (Term A n)), eqP A eqA n p q -> canonical A0 eqA ltM p -> canonical A0 eqA ltM q
plusP_inv2 : forall (A : Type) (A0 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop) (ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}), OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) ->...-> s = pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b (pluspf A0 (eqA:=eqA) plusA eqA_dec (ltM:=ltM) ltM_dec (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p) q)

```coq
intros l1 l2 l3 a H1 H2 H3 H4.
unfold canonical in H2, H3, H4. unfold canonical. intros x H5.
destruct H1.
- rewrite H. apply H3, H4.
- rewrite H. apply H2, H5.
```

original: intros l1 l2 l3 a H1 H2 H3 H4. unfold canonical in H2, H3, H4. unfold canonical. intros x H5. destruct H1. - rewrite H. apply H3, H4. - rewrite H. apply H2, H5.
